name: SCP: CLASSIFIED (demo)
description:
This is a demo for a game I have been working on for  about just over half a year. At its current state I wouldn't even call it a game, but I feel its got potential. Anyways, the enemy A.I. is so bad for now, the music probably gets annoying after the first 3 minutes (assuming you've played that long), the name for the game is stupid, and there is nothing to do right now but shoot bad guys. And, yes... this is my first game :P

So anyways, this is set in SCP. SCP is basically this world where mankind has to contain anomalies from destroying the world and stuff. At the moment you can play as 4 'classes'. The Scientist, Guard, Janitor (yep u heard me), and Agent. They are probably all unbalanced and crap but who cares ya know. After all this is merely a demo. 

Anyways, you should give it a shot. Just play around for a while. 

Sincerely, Dud3rdude. (oh so this is a letter now huh)
